result.title: The HEIR 1st layer of services package, final version
result.description: D43 will be delivered in M26 and will include the final version of the 1st layer of services package and specifically i the novel HEIR Client ii the threat detection module and the services for the RAMA score calculations at different levels iii the toolset for the visualisation of the HEIR reported security levels incidents threats statistics etc and iv the novel HEIR Aggregators The demonstrator will be presented in a short report

result.title: Dissemination strategy and activities, stakeholders' engagement and business opportunities - P2
result.description: The final dissemination report will be reporting in detail i the communication and dissemination strategies and plans that will integrate the project specific information with the requirements of the various market segments through the exploitation of the dissemination channels ii the development of the necessary dissemination material iii various dissemination activities that will be carried out such as papers publication presentations in conferences news publishing newsletters writing etc and iv the networking and liaisons with technical domainspecific communities policy makers and local authorities
